Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique].name: Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique]
Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique].fullText:
Transcendent Perfection Attack 11Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique]

Solving the riddle of motion lets you control your foe’s movement and keeps your enemies from doing the same to you.

Encounter        Full Discipline, Implement, Psionic, Psychic
Standard Action      Melee touch

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. Will

Hit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is either immobilized until the end of your next turn or you slide the target a number of squares equal to its speed.


Riddle of Motion [Movement Technique]

Encounter      Full Discipline, Psionic, Psychic
Move Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one of the following effects. You move twice your speed and gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks provoked by this movement; or you can ignore forced movement until the end of your next turn.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 78.
Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique].flavor: Solving the riddle of motion lets you control your foe’s movement and keeps your enemies from doing the same to you.
Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is either immobilized until the end of your next turn or you slide the target a number of squares equal to its speed.
Riddle of Motion [Attack Technique].effect: Choose one of the following effects. You move twice your speed and gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks provoked by this movement; or you can ignore forced movement until the end of your next turn.

Riddle of Invulnerability.name: Riddle of Invulnerability
Riddle of Invulnerability.fullText:
Transcendent Perfection Attack 20Riddle of Invulnerability

A pulse of psychic power tears at your enemies, exploiting the weakness of their flesh and enhancing your resilience.

Daily        Implement, Psionic, Psychic, Stance
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy you can see in the burst

Attack: Dexterity vs. Will

Hit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: You can enter the riddle of invulnerability stance. Until the stance ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 78.
Riddle of Invulnerability.flavor: A pulse of psychic power tears at your enemies, exploiting the weakness of their flesh and enhancing your resilience.
Riddle of Invulnerability.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Riddle of Invulnerability.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).
Riddle of Invulnerability.effect: You can enter the riddle of invulnerability stance. Until the stance ends, you gain resist 5 to all damage.

Riddle of Health.name: Riddle of Health
Riddle of Health.fullText:
Transcendent Perfection Utility 12Riddle of Health

Your knowledge lets you cleanse the body of injury and incapacitation.

Encounter        Healing, Psionic
Minor Action      Ranged 5

Target: You or one ally

Effect: The target spends a healing surge and makes a saving throw. If the saving throw is against a poison effect, it gains a +5 power bonus.


Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 78.
Riddle of Health.flavor: Your knowledge lets you cleanse the body of injury and incapacitation.
Riddle of Health.effect: The target spends a healing surge and makes a saving throw. If the saving throw is against a poison effect, it gains a +5 power bonus.
